app.debug_metrics Module

Metrics Tracking Implementation Module.

This module provides classes for tracking performance metrics within the RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) pipeline. It includes detailed timing for each processing phase, tracks token usage, retrieval statistics, and LLM configuration.

Classes:

  • PhaseMetrics: Tracks metrics for a specific phase of processing.

  • RAGMetrics: Manages overall metrics for the RAG pipeline.

class app.debug_metrics.PhaseMetrics(start_time: float, end_time: float | None = None, success: bool = True, error: str | None = None, details: ~typing.Dict = <factory>)
